Salman Khan And Family Invited As First Guests On Kapil Sharma's New Show. Here Are The Deets!
Salman Khan And Family Invited As First Guests On Kapil Sharma's New Show. Here Are The Deets!
After courting series of controversies, Comedian-actor-producer Kapil Sharma is all set to be back on the small screen. Kapil has started shooting for a new edition of "The Kapil Sharma Show" with Bollywood superstar Salman Khan as its first celebrity guest.
In case you are also a Kapil Sharma fan, here are all the deets.
1. The episode, which will be aired on Sony Entertainment Television, will also feature Salman's brothers Sohail Khan and Arbaaz Khan as well as their father Salim Khan, read a statement.
Sony
2. Kapil will be joined by his original gang - Chandan, Kiku Sharda, and Sumona Chakravarti.
Instagram
3. The old team: Comedians Bharti Singh and Krushna Abhishek along with Rochelle Rao will be a part of the show.

On the personal front, Kapil is all set to marry his fiance, Ginni, at her hometown in Jalandhar on December 12.
(With agency inputs)
